metadata.description: The name of existing OMS Log Analytics workspace.
The region to of existing OMS Log Analytics workspace.

variables.solutionDescription: OMS Solution for monitoring Storage Spaces Direct (S2D).

List.Title: Description
List.Content:
The purpose of this management solution is to provide monitoring for Storage Spaces Direct clusters. The solution relies on Failover Cluster Health Service API for data.

Requirements:

- [OMSIngestionAPI](https://www.powershellgallery.com/packages/OMSIngestionAPI/) PowerShell module installed on S2D nodes
- [S2DMon service](https://github.com/slavizh/s2d-oms-mgmt-solution) installed on S2D nodes

[Full documentation](https://github.com/slavizh/s2d-oms-mgmt-solution)

Author: [Stanislav Zhelyazkov](https://cloudadministrator.wordpress.com/)

Trend1.ChartQuery: Type=S2D_CL FaultLevel_s=Cluster  SeverityNumber_d>4  SecondTimeStamp_t>NOW-300SECONDS | measure count() by Reason_s,ClusterName_s,FaultId_g

Trend2.ChartQuery: Type=S2D_CL FaultLevel_s=Cluster  (SeverityNumber_d>2 AND SeverityNumber_d<5)  SecondTimeStamp_t>NOW-300SECONDS  | measure count() by Reason_s,ClusterName_s,FaultId_g

List.Query: Type=S2D_CL FaultLevel_s=Cluster  SecondTimeStamp_t>NOW-300SECONDS | measure countdistinct(FaultId_g) by Reason_s,Severity_s,ClusterName_s

Trend1.ChartQuery: Type=S2D_CL FaultLevel_s=Volume  SeverityNumber_d>4 SecondTimeStamp_t>NOW-300SECONDS | measure count() by Reason_s,ClusterName_s,FaultId_g

Trend2.ChartQuery: Type=S2D_CL FaultLevel_s=Volume  (SeverityNumber_d>2 AND SeverityNumber_d<5)   SecondTimeStamp_t>NOW-300SECONDS | measure count() by Reason_s,ClusterName_s,FaultId_g

List.Query: Type=S2D_CL FaultLevel_s=Volume  SecondTimeStamp_t>NOW-300SECONDS | measure countdistinct(FaultId_g) by Reason_s,Severity_s,ClusterName_s

List.Query: Type=S2D_CL FaultLevel_s=Share  SecondTimeStamp_t>NOW-300SECONDS | measure countdistinct(FaultId_g) by Reason_s,Severity_s,ClusterName_s

DataFlowVerification.Message: S2D Monitoring data is missing in OMS. Please make sure you have installed OMSS2DMon service on S2D nodes and that data is flowing to OMS.
